channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report E-2023090353
item.description:
Report E-2023090353

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-17
  • City: BELLE
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the poly55 gallon drum of hydroxysan Plus (un3109)had been punctured by a sharp object and had released 45 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.
